name: Blackthorne's Duncraig Cross
flavorText: The Duncraig Cross is awarded to those nobles who lead their knights to victory in defense of the realm.
flavorTextHtml: The Duncraig Cross is awarded to those nobles who lead their knights to victory in defense of the realm.
